name: Mastermind Re-Made
description:
This is a re-creation of a board game by Invicta Plastics called Mastermind. I made this game in a week to compare my knowledge from my past game project: Backgrounder. This was just to spur me to complete a project.

Instructions:

The goal of the game is to find a predetermined and random code that has been selected. You input a guess by selecting tokens and submitting them. If you get a black token in response to the guess, on the upper right side of the screen, you got 1 token (not corresponding to the position of the token in code) in the right spot. If you get a white token you got a correct token, but not in the right position. You get only a set amount of guesses.
